content: {"name": "Covenant House Greater Washington", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Call 2026109600 to set an appointment", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2001 Mississippi Ave SE", "address_2": null, "city": "Washington", "state_province": "DC", "postal_code": "20020", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.843604, "longitude": -76.974234}, "phones": [{"number": "(202) 247-0747", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:30", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
